Title: Fresh nationwide defections tilt 2027 balance as APC tightens grip
Summary: Fresh nationwide defections tilt 2027 balance as APC tightens grip . A new wave of defections by lawmakers, party executives and political blocs across Rivers, Sokoto, Zamfara and the FCT has signalled .

Title: Morocco 2025 AFCON: Will lacklustre Eagles soar to potential?
Summary: Nigerians have lost faith in the Super Eagles following their lacklustre World Cup campaign - the second in a row . Morocco 2025 AFCON: Will the Eagles soar to potential?

Title: Ahmed defends finances, welcomes probe of children’s education funding
Summary: Ahmed defends finances, welcomes probe of children's education funding . Outgoing Chief Executive Officer of the Nigerian Midstream and Downstream Petroleum Regulatory Authority (NMDPRA), Farouk Ahmed, is leaving the agency .

Title: The presidential order withdrawing police aides from VIPs
Summary: President Bola Tinubu’s order for the immediate withdrawal of all police officers attached to Very Very Very . The order is to bolster policing in the country .

Title: Africa’s migrant workers still trapped in exploitation, ITUC warns
Summary: African Regional Organisation of the International Trade Union Confederation, ITUC-Africa, has warned . Africa’s migrant workers continue to face widespread exploitation, abuse and insecurity .

Title: 2027: ADC nominates Tubo, Badawi as Transitional Committee chair, Secretary for Borno
Summary: African Democratic Congress nominates Adamu Usman Tubo as Transitional Committee Chairman . Hon. Sunusi Lawan Badawi emerged as the Secretary for Borno . Badawi hails from Borno North Senatorial District .

Title: Why we’re now considering satellites for telecom services – Airtel
Summary: Recent advances in satellite technology, driven by SpaceX’s Starlink, have made satellite-based telecom services both effective and cost-efficient .

Title: Ondo Deep Sea Port to serve Nigeria, West Africa — Aiyedatiwa
Summary: The proposed Ondo Deep Sea Port will serve as a major hub for international trade . It will serve not only Nigeria but Nigeria and neighbouring West African countries .

Title: Dangote Refinery’s PMS supply will reduce petrol price, says IPMAN
Summary: Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria (IPMAN) has called on all its members nationwide to patronise the Dangote Refinery in their purchase of PMS products . The refinery already offers the best affordable price for all marketers, even as free delivery commences in January 2026 .

Title: IPMAN eyes refinery ownership, orders members to buy Dangote fuel
Summary: Independent Petroleum Marketers Association of Nigeria has disclosed plans to venture into refinery ownership, subject to regulatory approval . The move is part of efforts to deepen domestic refining and reduce Nigeria’s reliance on imported petroleum products . The association also directed its members nationwide to prioritise the purchase of Premium Motor Spirit from the Dangote Petroleum Refinery

Title: Lagos to divert traffic for Autofest race Sunday
Summary: Lagos State Government has announced a temporary traffic diversion ahead of the 7th Road Edition of the Lagos Autofest 2025 Race scheduled for Sunday, December 22, 2025 . The government said vehicular movement would be restricted around Inner Marina, Marina Road and Kakawa Street on Lagos Island between 12noon and 7pm .

Title: APC confirms Plateau gov's defection from PDP
Summary: The All Progressives Congress has announced the defection of Plateau State Governor, Caleb Mutfwang, from the Peoples Democratic Party to the ruling party . The announcement was made on Wednesday by the APC National Chairman, Prof. Nentawe Yilwatda, during the party’s 14th National Caucus meeting held

Title: Tinubu appoints Oseni NERC chairman, drops Ramat
Summary: President Bola Tinubu appoints Dr Mulisiu Oseni as chairman of the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission . Osoni’s appointment indicates that he has dropped Abdullahi Ramat, whose name he sent to the Senate for confirmation in August . Ramat had stormed the Abuja headquarters of NERC to take over

Title: Ebonyi ACP slumps during meeting, dies in hospital
Summary: Assistant Commissioner of Police, Ogbon-Inu Taiwo Popoola, has died in Ebonyi State . The incident occurred around 11am on Tuesday while he was attending a management meeting at the command headquarters in Abakaliki . He suddenly developed breathing difficulties and began gasping for air during the meeting .
